job description:
Description: Performs technical planning, RF payload performance, and verification and validation at the subsystem and system level. Executes analysis of payload test data, payload calibration and creation of verification reports. Key to this position is establishing and maintaining an excellent working relationship with team members and other functional organizations. Candidate must possess strong teamwork, problem solving, and customer interaction skills.
Desired Skills: Experience in RF hardware design, RF system performance analysis, requirement allocation, functional decomposition, and requirement verification planning. Excellent communications skills. Experience with MSP mission. Active TS/SCI Clearance.
BASIC QUALIFICATIONS:
  • Experience with RF performance analysis.
  • Experience with MATLAB.
  • Strong communications capabilities with peers and management, with proven oral and written presentation and interpersonal relations skills.
  • Must possess the ability work with minimal direction; be self-motivated.
  • Ability to obtain a TS/SCI Clearance.
